titleStmt.title: The doctrinal of princes made by the noble oratour Isocrates, [and] translated out of Greke in to Englishe by syr Thomas Eliot knight
To Nicocles. English
titleStmt.author: Isocrates.
Elyot, Thomas, Sir, 1490?-1546.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Flete strete, in the house of Thomas Berthelet,

notesStmt.note: Printer's name and address from colophon; publication date estimated by STC.
The woodcut frame on title page has "1534" in the sill.
Running title reads: Isocrates to Nicocles.
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library and the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
Appears at reel 54 (British Library copy) and at reel 143 (Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery copy).
